# Shank

Shank makes it possible to extract IDLs from Rust Solana program code annotated with Shank attribute macros. This IDL can then be fed to [Solita](../solita) in order to generate low level TypeScript SDK for that particular Rust program.

ðŸ”— Helpful links:

  • [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/shank)

  • [Rust Crate](https://crates.io/crates/shank)

  • [CLI Rust Crate](https://crates.io/crates/shank-cli)
